desc: Looking for GU, Clif, First Endurance, Honey Stinger, Picky Bars or Endurance Tap? Free shipping in Canada on orders >$75 and great service from people just as excited about being active as you are.

layout.text: Let's be honest, endurance sports are tough.  We're here to support you in your passion and make it easy to buy what you need so that you can focus on finding the Joy (ILO) in every footstep, pedal stroke and breath along the way.
